de.axnsoftware.settings

Annotation Type Property


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={FIELD,TYPE})
public @interface Property
    The annotation Property must be present on all fields of a PropertyClass which should be read from or written to the backend store.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Carsten Klein "cklein"

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String defaultValue
      For simple types, e.g.
      String key
      The key specifies the relative key by which the property is addressed in the underlying store.
      String typeMapper
      For custom types, which have not been annotated by the PropertyClass annotation, custom type mappers ITypeMapper can be specified.

    • Element Detail

      • key

        public abstract String key
        The key specifies the relative key by which the property is addressed in the underlying store. By default, the annotated field's name will be used. In order to override the default behaviour, a custom key must be specified. Please note that the specified key must adhere to the standard Java package name production rules.
        Returns:
        the specified key or the empty string
        Default:
        ""

      • defaultValue

        public abstract String defaultValue
        For simple types, e.g. Integer or String, and custom types for which there exists a type mapper, one can define a default value. The default value will be set when loading the PropertyClass via its associated ISettingsStore.
        Returns:
        the default value as a string or the empty string
        Default:
        ""

      • typeMapper

        public abstract String typeMapper
        For custom types, which have not been annotated by the PropertyClass annotation, custom type mappers ITypeMapper can be specified. By default, the DefaultTypeMapperImpl will be used.
        Returns:
        the fully qualified class name of the type mapper implementation
        Default:
        "de.axnsoftware.settings.impl.DefaultTypeMapperImpl"
